document.heading: Consolidated Mt. Pleasant, Ward 2, and Ward 6, Single Sales Moratorium Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-287, the “Consolidated Mt. Pleasant, Ward 2, and Ward 6, Single Sales Moratorium Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-846 which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 15, 2008, and October 7, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 27, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-553 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-287 became effective on December 24, 2008.
